products.description: The track-inspired Audi RS 7 captivates with unbridled power and a kinetic presence.
The Audi R8 performance Coupe brings the racing-inspired performance you seek with uncompromised styling. This is your opportunity to enjoy the exhilarating performance that lies within.
With a dynamic look, the 2022 TT RS features a 2.5-liter engine and delivers a distinctive 5-cylinder sound, which harkens back to the original turbocharged 5-cylinder of the Ur-quattro.
